definitions.definition: Deviation from what is right ; gross injustice , sin , wickedness .
An act of great injustice or unfairness ; a sinful or wicked act; an unconscionable deed .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Deviation from what is right ; gross injustice , sin , wickedness .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An act of great injustice or unfairness ; a sinful or wicked act; an unconscionable deed .
